channel.title: Open Source on BLOG
channel.description: Recent content in Open Source on BLOG

item.title: Ollama: Why and How to Use It
item.description: A comprehensive guide to Ollama — what it is, why it matters, and how to download, install, and use it effectively for coding and AI projects.

item.title: Why AI Should Be Open Source
item.description: An analysis of the importance of making AI open-source — promoting accessibility, collaboration, and innovation.

item.title: Best Tools for Student Developers (2025 Edition)
item.description: A custom guide to essential tools for student developers in 2025 — focusing on productivity, learning, and open-source accessibility.

item.title: Introduction — Dihan Ramanayaka
item.description: A personal introduction and my mission to make AI open source and accessible for everyone.

item.title: Introducing RandomCatUser
item.description: Introducing RandomCatUser — an open, template-based approach to using CodeScript efficiently.
